Sentence.string: About assigning the roles, did you hesitate between Marcus Blayton and Edward norrington ?

Both of them are really good actors, I’d been hesitating for a long time to give Edward a chance. He’s a very good friend of mine, but in view of the situation of the company, I had to favour the success of the play, that’s why I made this choice.
Was the relationship between both actors good ? Did they know they were competing ?

Yes, they did. I invited them to discuss about it and to announce my choice. I must confess that the atmosphere during the diner was a bit tensed but I expected that. I finally calmed them down and everything returned to normal. At least this is what I thought until what happened yesterday ...
